### Tab Module

```jsx noeditor
const Tab = require('./tab.tsx').default;
const tabMock = require('./mocks/tab.json');

const tabItemMock = require('./../tab-item/mocks/tab-item.json');
const TabItem = require('./../tab-item/tab-item.tsx').default;

const tabItemModule = <TabItem config={tabItemMock.config}/>;

<Tab
    context={tabMock.context}
    config={tabMock.config} 
    slots={{tabItem: [tabItemModule]}}
    />
```
